attributes.review: Why trump why you took my happiness away from me I loved tiktok you just don’t want people to be happy you jerk I wish you would be a good president for once bye
attributes.title: Trump should be canceled

attributes.review: first of all the fact that this orange faced man is saying mexicans need to go back to their country and being completely racist is disgusting. i don’t want this man as our president anymore. the only people i know who will vote for trump are my 70 year old grandparents. i do not have any opinions on who else should be elected instead of trump but i know trump should not be elected.
attributes.title: ✨horrible✨

attributes.review: The second you open the app it asks for your phone number and you CANNOT continue onto the app unless you’ve given them your number.
attributes.title: TRYING TO STEAL PERSONAL INFORMATION

attributes.review: This app is worse than I thought my phone glitched a lot and it and ran up a lot of my storage and barely charged
attributes.title: Horrible app

attributes.review: i downloaded this app bc i thought it was about ur president ?? turns out it’s like five nights at freddy’s with scary pictures and propaganda of a cheeto. very disappointed and i will be deleting.
attributes.title: -2/10 ✨🧚‍♂️🤪🥰 JUMPSCARED BY A FAT ORANGE MAN (i had a heart attack 😱)

attributes.review: You know it won’t let me buy another president I was very disappointed that I’m still stuck with a orange Cheeto person so yea.
attributes.title: Disappointed

attributes.review: So I opened this app and the second I did it my leg fell off and I glued it back and it went missing also my eyes went shut as soon as I saw a dried orange peel??? Yeah this app is a no no 🦀
attributes.title: My leg

attributes.review: Not only is this man a racist and homophobe, but he is single handedly ruining this country. He pulled out of the World Health Organization in the midst of a global pandemic. This man should not be noted for #1 in news, for he spreads lies and hatred in all of his messages.
attributes.title: Awful

attributes.review: I currently live overseas and have an international phone number, however, Donald Trump doesn’t seem to understand that there are Americans living overseas. Not that I wanted to use the app anyways✨💖💞🧚
attributes.title: Overseas Americans

attributes.review: This app is so bad it is really glitchy and kicks you out multiple times it is just a really bad quality app
attributes.title: Horrible
